organizations: Sioux Falls Hit & Run Crash Sioux Falls Hit & Run
title: Sioux Falls Hit & Run Crash
text:
Sioux Falls Hit & Run Crash October 25, 2015, 8:06 AM by Perry Groten SIOUX FALLS, SD - 
Authorities closed part of Interstate 29 following a hit & run crash in Sioux Falls. 
The crash between a pickup and motorcycle happened around 4:30 a.m. Sunday near the Interstate 29 & I-229 interchange. 
The pickup rolled, but the driver was missing from the vehicle. 
There's no word on the condition of the motorcyclist. 
The South Dakota Highway Patrol is investigating. Â© 2015 KELOLAND TV. All Rights Reserved.
